fields.name: 50-ringing-things
fields.description: People like goals and challenges - it motivates them, maintains their interest and gets them engaged so this latest ART initiative is aiming to meet that need. This scheme aims to show that ringing is both interesting and fun.

fields.name: bell_ropes
fields.description: Bell ropes, available with selected sally colours.  Price per 6ft/ length.  Contact us to discuss sally style or any special circumstances.

fields.name: bear_on_a_bell1
fields.description: Allow people to get your attention in style!  They pull on the bear and the bell will ring, alerting you to their presence.  Let the dull doorbell end a death, and start entertaining your visitors by introducing them to your bell-ringing bear!
